directions: Mix jicama, mango, cucumber, cilantro, lime juice, ginger, and cayenne pepper together in a large bowl. Cover with plastic wrap and refrigerate until flavors meld, at least 24 hours.
ingredients: 1  jicama, peeled and cut into matchsticks
1  cucumber, peeled and cut into matchsticks
¼ cup chopped cilantro, or to taste
1 tablespoon lime juice, or to taste
½ teaspoon cayenne pepper, or to taste
title: Jicama Mango Slaw with Ginger
